Config.UseRobinsService.Name: Use Robin's Service
Config.UseRobinsService.Tooltip: Adds tree transplant option to Robin's shop menu (disables free mode).
Config.WildTreeTransplantPrice.Name: Wild Tree Transplant Cost
Config.WildTreeTransplantPrice.Tooltip: Gold price per wild tree when using Robin's service.
Config.FruitTreeTransplantPrice.Name: Fruit Tree Transplant Cost
Config.FruitTreeTransplantPrice.Tooltip: Gold price per fruit tree when using Robin's service.
Config.TransplantModeKeybind.Name: Free Transplant Mode Key
Config.TransplantModeKeybind.Tooltip: The key used to toggle transplant mode directly. This option applies only when Robin's service is disabled.
Config.ForceTransplant.Name: Force Transplant
Config.ForceTransplant.Tooltip: Let's you transplant freely in any tile. Bypassing normal transplant check.
Config.AllowTapped.Name: Allow Tapped
Config.AllowTapped.Tooltip: Lets you transplant tapped trees in both modes.
Config.AllowStumps.Name: Allow Stumps
Config.AllowStumps.Tooltip: Lets you transplant tree stumps in both modes.
Config.AllowLightningStruck.Name: Allow Lightning Trees
Config.AllowLightningStruck.Tooltip: Lets you tranpslant lightning-hit fruit trees in both modes.
Config.OnlyMatureTrees.Name: Mature Trees Only
Config.OnlyMatureTrees.Tooltip: Limits transplant to fully grown trees. Disable for any growth stage.
CarpenterMenu.Banner.PickLocation: Select a new location for the tree
